name: Lucky Mayor
description:
In this roguelike mayor simulation game, you will become the leader of a city, taking on the role of a mayor. Your task is to recruit citizens, promote business prosperity, and establish a comprehensive industrial chain to meet the diverse needs of the population. Through wise planning and decision-making, transform your city into a thriving supercity that citizens take pride in, and become their admired leader!


We have an extensive deck of cards, currently with over 150 citizens available for use, each with their unique abilities and preferences.

You need to meet the citizens' preferences to earn coins and, by the final deadline, obtain enough coins to prove that you are a capable mayor.


We also have a wide range of items and different difficulty levels to enrich your gaming experience, and the development team will continue to provide updates for even more game content.

Please follow us on Discord, and we will be delighted to hear your thoughts and feedback on the game.
